meanings.definition: Equip or outfit with necessary items or supplies.
meanings.sent1: The hikers accouters themselves with backpacks and water bottles before starting the trail.
meanings.sent2: She accouters her kitchen with all the tools needed for baking.
meanings.sent3: The magician accouters himself with a cape and hat for his grand performance.
meanings.sent4: The knight accouters himself with armor before heading into battle.
meanings.sent5: The chef accouters the restaurant kitchen with top-of-the-line appliances.

meanings.definition: One who provides or supplies equipment or supplies.
meanings.sent1: The accouters at the camping store helped us find the perfect tent for our trip.
meanings.sent2: The accouters in the army ensure that soldiers have all the necessary gear for missions.
meanings.sent3: The accouters at the party rental shop made sure every guest had a chair to sit on.
meanings.sent4: The accouters for the film crew made sure all the cameras were in working order.
meanings.sent5: The accouters for the construction site delivered the needed materials on time.
